name: First Steps

quests.name: Shelter from the Storm
quests.description:
Before you do anything else, you'll probably need a crafting table... 

 In Permafrost, you're able to access the crafting grid as long as you have a crafting table in your inventory.

description:
The world is dead. Most, if not all life has been taken by the Storm.
 Yet... here you are. With nothing but a Flint and Steel and the will to live. You're alive, for now... but the storm isn't letting up. It may never let up.

 For now, there's nothing you can do but survive it.
